content: अवघातः [अव हन्-घञ्] {@--1@} Striking. {@--2@} Hurting, killing. {@--3@} A violent or sharp blow, stroke or blow in general; कर्णावघातनिपुणेन च ताड्यमाना दूरीकृताः करिवरेण (भृंगाः) <ls>Nītipr. 2</ls>; अधरे दत्तदंतावघाते <ls>S. D.</ls> {@--4@} Threshing corn by bruising it with a wooden pestle in a mortar. {@--5@} Unnatural or accidental death.
